timeline.bodyText: what's the issue with calling init()?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText: With init() the member variables cannot be declared as final. IMO declaring them as final can enhance the readability because these variables should only be set once and should not be changed.
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang
